name: pizza game (itch) (cam / arzo)
description:
Deliver pizza. Sounds easy?

The business is booming, and pizza is selling well. Too well. Rival food stores have joined together to shut down your pizza delivery service using any means necessary.

In this Pacman-like pizza delivery game, you must avoid the attacks of multiple unique foes, serve pizza to your customers, and fight back to maintain the success of your business!

Includes:

  • Eight action-packed levels
  • Medium, hard and expert difficulties
  • Unlockable medals for each level and difficulty
  • Different enemy types and behaviours
  • Exciting pizza-throwing gameplay
